speaker: Alex
text: *Alex walks into Mary's apartment, tears streaming down his face.* Mary... Victoria... *He breaks down, unable to complete the sentence.*

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary, taken aback, rushes to his side.* Alex, what happened? *She asks, her voice trembling.*

speaker: Alex
text: *Alex sobs uncontrollably, struggling to find the words.* The village... Rebels... They killed everyone... Victoria... *His voice breaks.*

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary gasps, her heart pounding.* No, Alex... *Her own tears start falling.* I... I don't know what to say...

speaker: Alex
text: *Alex collapses onto the couch, his body wracked with sobs.* She was just helping... She didn't deserve... *He chokes on his words.*

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary sits next to him, her arm wrapping around him in comfort.* I know, Alex... I know... *Her voice is barely a whisper as they mourn together.*

speaker: Alex
text: *Alex takes a deep breath, wiping his eyes.* Can we... Can we pray, Mary? *His voice is hoarse from crying.*

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary nods, squeezing his hand in support.* Of course, Alex.

speaker: Alex
text: *Alex bows his head, his voice shaky.* Dear God... we come to You in our time of grief... We trust in Your plans, but right now... it's so hard... *He chokes on his words.*

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary joins in, her voice steady.* Lord, we know Your ways are higher than ours... Please give us strength in this time... comfort Alex's heart... *Her voice quivers at the end.*

speaker: Alex
text: *Alex continues, gaining strength from Mary's words.* And Victoria... God, please... She served You... She loved You... *His voice breaks again.*

speaker: Mary
text: *Mary adds, tears streaming down her face.* We trust her soul is with You... Guide us in honoring her memory, Lord... *Her voice fades into a whisper.*
